column4: hello, i've got an interesting problem: my pc boots with ata1.01 error messages, it does that even if i boot from the 9.04 live cd instead of from my harddisk (8.10 i think). any ideas what could be wrong or what i should do?
a broken harddisk often affects the whole bus. See if you can boot from CD if you physically disconnect the harddisk
actually that should isolate the broken hd... but you never know. I'd try disconnecting
